title: People who afk
body: Like why can people still be able to afk and really screw us over. Remaking games still doesn't give us a solution since people can just buy items go to lane and then just leave the game and that screw everyone over which I literally deranked because of it.

replies.body: My first game today a guy just afk'd out of nowhere without a word or even a death and lost my promo's. Ive been on tilt all day because of it. Riot will punish me soon for being a bad boy.
They should change it so players wont lose LP when there is afk on your team, but also cannot gain. And an option to surrender.
